extends Object
implements SDFType
    PBR using the Specular/Glossiness workflow.

      • getAlbedoMap

        public final String getAlbedoMap()

      • getSpecularMap

      • getGlossinessMap

        public final String getGlossinessMap()
        Filename of the glossiness map.

      • getGlossiness

        public final String getGlossiness()
        Material glossiness in the range of [0-1], where 0 represents a rough surface and 1 represents a smooth surface. This is the inverse of a roughness map in a PBR metal workflow.

      • getAmbientOcclusionMap

        public final String getAmbientOcclusionMap()
        Filename of the ambient occlusion map. The map defines the amount of ambient lighting on the surface.

      • getNormalMap

        public final String getNormalMap()
        Filename of the normal map. The normals can be in the object space or tangent space as specified in the 'type' attribute

      • getEmissiveMap

        public final String getEmissiveMap()
        Filename of the emissive map.

      • getLightMap

        public final String getLightMap()
        Filename of the light map. The light map is a prebaked light texture that is applied over the albedo map

      • setAlbedoMap

        public final void setAlbedoMap(String albedoMap)
        Filename of the diffuse/albedo map.

      • setSpecularMap

        public final void setSpecularMap(String specularMap)
        Filename of the specular map.

      • setGlossinessMap

        public final void setGlossinessMap(String glossinessMap)
        Filename of the glossiness map.

      • setGlossiness

        public final void setGlossiness(String glossiness)
        Material glossiness in the range of [0-1], where 0 represents a rough surface and 1 represents a smooth surface. This is the inverse of a roughness map in a PBR metal workflow.

      • setAmbientOcclusionMap

        public final void setAmbientOcclusionMap(String ambientOcclusionMap)
        Filename of the ambient occlusion map. The map defines the amount of ambient lighting on the surface.

      • setNormalMap

        public final void setNormalMap(String normalMap)
        Filename of the normal map. The normals can be in the object space or tangent space as specified in the 'type' attribute

      • setEmissiveMap

        public final void setEmissiveMap(String emissiveMap)
        Filename of the emissive map.

      • setLightMap

        public final void setLightMap(String lightMap)
